creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: more richly shaded and detailed image of two-sailed junk with dinghy; extra blue and green added to water; lighter color grid at L edge with lighter grey and pink grades; signature and seal LLC
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: From a Printing Order of A Junk
